Ingredients.1: 0.5 pound lean ground beef, or more to taste

Ingredients.5: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.8: 8 ounces reduced-fat processed cheese food (such as Velveeta®), cut into small pieces

Ingredients.9: 2 tablespoons reduced-fat sour cream, or more to taste

Directions.1: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook and stir ground beef, onion, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and black pepper in the hot skillet until beef is browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease.

Directions.2: Increase heat to high. Add water to ground beef mixture in the skillet. Cover and bring to a boil. Stir macaroni into boiling water-ground beef mixture. Cover, lower heat to medium, and cook for 5 minutes. Stir, cover, and continue cooking until macaroni is tender, about 5 minutes.

Directions.3: Stir processed cheese food into ground beef-macaroni mixture until melted. Remove from heat; stir in sour cream.
